      Return the PasswordStrength resource to configure the password strength policy.

      Specifies the maximum quantity of total characters allowed in a password by this policy.

      Specifies the minimum quantity of diacritic characters required by this policy.

      Specifies the minimum quantity of uppercase characters (i.e.
      PasswordStrength PasswordStrength.setPreventReuse(int preventReuse)
      Specifies the quantity of the previously used passwords (i.e history) that will not be allowed to be reused when modifying the password for an Account belonging to the associated Directory.
